pain_point: Legacy payment infrastructure slowing down expansion into Southeast Asian markets
lead_message: We process 2M transactions/month but our batch settlement system cant keep up. Looking for real-time payment orchestration.

pain_point: Farmers cant access market pricing data in rural areas with poor connectivity
lead_message: We have 50k smallholder farmers on our platform but churn is 30% because the offline experience is terrible. Need a better mobile-first solution.

pain_point: Clinical trial patient matching takes weeks instead of hours
lead_message: Our hospital partners are losing 40% of eligible trial candidates because manual screening is too slow. We need AI-powered matching.
